title: Dashboard
welcomeSubtitle: Submit crop data and view provincial analytics

noData.title: No Data Yet
noData.desc: Submit your first crop data to see analytics here.

cropDistribution.title: Crop Distribution
cropDistribution.description: Number of submissions by crop type

form.submitDescription: Enter your farming details for regional insights

intro.title: Getting started
intro.body: This simple form will guide you step-by-step. You will fill one detail at a time. It takes about a minute.
intro.note: You can move back and forward anytime. Your district will be filled automatically.

crop.title: Crop Type
crop.description: Select the crop you grew this season. This helps us compare production across your district.

area.title: Area Cultivated (acres)
area.description: Enter total land used for this crop in acres. Use decimals if needed, e.g., 10.5.

harvested_amount.title: Harvested Amount (tons)
harvested_amount.description: Total quantity harvested in metric tons. If not harvested yet, enter 0.

wastage.title: Wastage (%)
wastage.description: Approximate percentage of the harvest lost or wasted (0 to 100).

reason.title: Reason for Wastage
reason.description: Choose the main reason for wastage. This helps identify support needs.

attestation.title: Confirm Accuracy
attestation.description: Please confirm the information you provided is correct to the best of your knowledge.

attestation.text: I confirm the data provided is accurate to the best of my knowledge and may be subject to verification.

authRequired.title: Authentication required
authRequired.desc: Please log in to submit data.

submitSuccess.title: Data submitted successfully!
submitSuccess.desc: Your crop data has been recorded.

validation.harvestedNonNegative: Harvested amount must be 0 or greater
validation.attestationConfirm: You must confirm the data is accurate
